item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Data overview
item.description: Below you can find reproducible data sources for every one of my papers: The Political Elite and The Welfare State Figures Analyses Tables Political Rents under a Changing Electoral Regime Figures Analyses Tables Political Connections in Colonial Indonesia Figures Analyses Tables

item.title: My R Packages
item.description: Here are some links to some of the R packages I have created: Clio Clio is a package that facilitates the usage of the Clio-Infra database. It helps the user extract data based on simple queries, instead of repeatedly downloading Excel files. In addition, it facilitates reproducible research by explicitly documenting data collection. hdng hdng is a package that serves as an interface for the HDNG Database.
